keyword: how many calories in miso soup
title: How Many Calories in Miso Soup?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in miso soup per cup, including macros like protein, carbs, fat, sodium details, and recipe tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in Miso Soup?
assumptions: Standard miso soup made with miso paste, dashi broth, tofu, wakame seaweed, and green onions; about 240 ml per cup.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by recipe, brand of miso, added ingredients like mushrooms or extra tofu, and preparation method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One cup of miso soup contains about 70 calories, with 6 g protein and high sodium.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaged products.

faqs.q: How many calories in one bowl of miso soup?
faqs.a: About 70 calories per cup (240 ml) of standard miso soup.

faqs.q: Is miso soup high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, typically 1600 mg per cup due to miso paste; opt for low-sodium versions.

faqs.q: What are the macros in miso soup?
faqs.a: Per cup: 6 g protein, 8 g carbs, 2 g fat, with 1 g fiber.

faqs.q: How does homemade miso soup compare to restaurant?
faqs.a: Homemade can be lower in calories (50-80 kcal) if less miso is used; restaurant portions may add oil or extras.

faqs.q: Can miso soup be part of a low-calorie diet?
faqs.a: Yes, at ~70 kcal per cup it's light, but watch sodium if on a restricted diet.
